channel.title: Posts on claudioscheer
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on claudioscheer

item.title: Android Virtual Devices (AVD) in command line
item.description: Install dependencies $ANDROID_HOME/tools/bin/sdkmanager "system-images;android-28;google_apis;x86_64" "emulator" Create AVD $ANDROID_HOME/tools/bin/avdmanager create avd --force -n Nexus6P --package "system-images;android-28;google_apis;x86_64" --device "Nexus 6P" Run AVD $ANDROID_HOME/emulator/emulator -avd Nexus6P Delete AVD $ANDROID_HOME/tools/bin/avdmanager delete avd -n Nexus6P

item.title: Deep learning materials
item.description: Bellow there are some materials that can help you to understand deep learning. Courses Machine learning by Stanford University (link) Books Deep Learning with Python by Francois Chollet (link) Deep Learning by Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio, and Aaron Courville (link) Neural Networks and Deep Learning by Michael Nielsen (link) Videos Neural Networks Demystified by stephencwelch(link) Others Awesome IA (link)
